ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Video translation, localization, and dubbing with a focus on generating high-quality subtitles and dubbing for videos.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ YouTube video download via yt-dlp â€¢ Word-level and Low-illusion subtitle recognition with WhisperX â€¢ NLP and AI-powered subtitle segmentation
ðŸ“– Summary: VideoLingo is a tool for video translation, localization, and dubbing that uses AI to generate high-quality, single-line subtitles and dubbing. It supports multiple languages and offers features like YouTube video download, AI-powered subtitle segmentation, and custom terminology generation. The application is designed for ease of use with a one-click startup in Streamlit.
